entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as devising a method of communicating the time and date of the next meeting to all members. She is also mentioned as giving each member of the D.A. a fake Galleon.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as becoming excited when he saw the basket of fake Galleons.

entities.name: d.a.
entities.description: The D.A. is mentioned as a group that Hermione and Ron are part of.

entities.name: goblin
entities.description: Goblins are mentioned as being responsible for casting real Galleons.

relationships.description: Hermione is a member of the D.A. group.
Ron is also a member of the D.A. group.
Hermione mentions that real Galleons are cast by goblins.
